${ModID}:Backswing.NAME: Backswing
${ModID}:Backswing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Bunker.NAME: Bunker
${ModID}:Bunker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade adjacent cards.

${ModID}:DragonPunch.NAME: Dragon Punch
${ModID}:DragonPunch.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GravityHammer.NAME: Gravity Hammer
${ModID}:GravityHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal equal damage to adjacent enemies.

${ModID}:PlanAhead.NAME: Plan Ahead
${ModID}:PlanAhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Rearrange your hand.

${ModID}:PowerShot.NAME: Power Shot
${ModID}:PowerShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if adjacent to a Power.

${ModID}:RollingPunch.NAME: Rolling Punch
${ModID}:RollingPunch.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you already played Rolling Punch this turn, shuffle a *Dragon Punch into your draw pile.

${ModID}:SliceAndDice.NAME: Slice and Dice
${ModID}:SliceAndDice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat at half damage. NL Repeat at quarter damage twice.
